item.title: Solving Problems on Graph
item.description: Node Classification Given graph that has incomplete attribute labeling of the nodes, predict the attributes on the nodes. The following concepts can be used to classify nodes. Homophily Homophily on Graph Homophily is the principle that a contact between similar people occurs at ahigher rate than among dissimilar people – McPherson20011 McPherson2001 McPherson M, Smith-Lovin L, Cook JM. Birds of a Feather: Homophily in Social Networks. Annu Rev Sociol. 2001;27: 415â€“444. doi:10.1146/annurev.soc.27.1.415  ↩︎ , Structural equivalence Structural Equivalence on Graph Structural Equivalence means that nodes with similar neighborhood structures will share similar attributes.
